title: That Puppy with the Cute Eyes
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>So cute… he’s so cute…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Emma-saaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Sorry to keep you waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Sorry we’re late!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s alright, I was looking at this cute doggy~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Oh, that’s Hachiko, right? He’s a very famous dog.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>They made a movie about him too. It’s such a moving story that you can’t watch it without crying.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Oh, I see! Hey, why don’t we take a picture together with him?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That sounds great! We can show the picture to everyone at today’s event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Good idea! Alright… I’ll take the picture now~! Say “Nijigasaki”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Nijigasaki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Nijigasaki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Nijigasaki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
